item.title: Monitor your Elasitcsearch Cluster with Grafana and Prometheus
item.description: Monitoring Elasticsearch Cluster is necessary and important for both testing and production. Kibana and Grafana are awesome tools for monitoring and visualization. In this post, I’ll introduce how to monitor Elasticsearch Cluster by using Grafana with datasource is Prometheus.
